column4: The food here is outstanding! I recommend to everyone, because THIS PLACE IS A MUST TRY!!!! Also the location is right around the corner of my work office so it‚Äôs easy, accessible, and delicious!
While in holiday we had pizza from this place it was fantastic the place was packed with people the pizza was fresh and tasty We will definitely be visiting this place again.
Excellent customer service and great pizza üçï‚ù§Ô∏è I visited in 2018 and everyday every bite of the pizza and amazingly only for a dollar
If U have one dollar and wants to eat pizza...Can be a good option to do. Check It. In my opini√≥n Is Not Bad.
The only place in New York where you can actually eat good pizza without paying a fortune. Good prices for drinks too.
Paid a fortune going into Italian pizza places and this was the best pizza I had tired in newyork city! And only for a dollar or 2 slices and a juice for $2.95! Amazing value for money.

column3: A must try if you‚Äôre in NYC
column4: Amazing. Kept us going through the day whilst we were exploring NYC. Can‚Äôt beat it. Feels like a must if you‚Äôre in the city!
You can‚Äôt beat this deal! Two slices and a soda under $3. These are large slices! Definitely will be back. The workers are super fast and friendly.

column3: New York trip of a lifetime
column4: Lovely pizza snack for busy lifestyle, at only 99 cents per slice this can‚Äôt be beaten.... just watch the grease!

column3: Hole in the wall but amazing
column4: Hole in the wall but amazing pizza. You can get a whole pizza for $8.00 fast and friendly service. If you see a long line it will go fast.
at 1:00 am in Times Square we had some slices and we were impressed. It was pretty good and at $.99 for cheese and $1.50 Pepperoni you can‚Äôt beat it!!
Went here after a typical New York slice of pizza and this did not disappoint. Great value and the pizza wasn‚Äôt too greasy either.
Im not sure how the do it, but Im glad they do. We pre-ordered 2 whole large pies, they were ready when we got there. There will be a line, but it moves. CASH ONLY. Staff is very friendly
Six slices of margarita, six dollars. Impossible to get better value than that, and served with a smile. Very UNLIKE New York, not to get ripped off.
Perfect classic NY pizza! Highly recommend this place. Gets busy but for a reason. Line was out the door and down the sidewalk but moved quickly movedquickly and worth the wait.
All that and more,parmesan cheese and hot sauce.very good hot sauce.good flavor and not to hot.soda and slice deals.very good.I was here every night.
Cheap, fast pizza. I got 2 slices, one of each pepperoni and sausage, and a soda all for $4. The pizza crust is very good. No long lines.

column3: Pizza slice $1 - what‚Äôs not to love
column4: Pizza slice for a $1 and right next to Bryant park. There are lots of $ pizza places around, so well worth searching them out. Can‚Äôt really go wrong!

Very affordable, pizza to go by the slice type of joint. Decent choice of toppings, fast service. Questionable safety --plenty of loitering and soliciting from the street. Best to go in a group. For younger crowd, not a destination for families.

column3: Best bang for buck pizza ever!!!
column4: Its Cheap and delicious. Clearly, my best bang for buck food in New York City. Better get the 2.75, 2 slices plus soda or arizona drink.
Does exactly what you'd hope for decent pizza for a very low price. Very convenient and good value for money.

column3: Who Knew a 99 Cent piece of pizza could be so good?
column4: 99 Cent Pizza? I was skeptical...but walking back to the hotel after a show it hit the spot. Hot, fresh and ready to eat. Surprisingly good.

column3: Can't go wrong with a 99 cent slice
column4: Decent pizza. They were quick. 50 cent extra for toppings which they just toss on an already cooked cheese pizza and heat up. After a night of drinking, nothing could have tasted better.
Went there with a big group and it was quick, tasty and fillings. Went the 2 x slices of plain pizza with a can and it hit the spot. Can‚Äôt go wrong!

I know. It sounds crazy. 99 cent pizza? My wife was skeptical too. But.... the pizza is awesome, and I'm not just saying that because of the price. I came in with low expectations (not sure I trusted the reviews), and came away very satisfied.

In New York, eating-out could be very expensive, but I found this place and love it! Each slice is very big and tastes great!!! Pizza is 99 cent each or 2 slices + soda = $2.50. „Éã„É•„Éº„É®„Éº„ÇØ„ÅØÈ´ò„ÅÑ„ÅäÈáë„ÇíÂá∫„Åõ„Å∞ÁæéÂë≥„Åó„ÅÑÈ£ü„ÅπÁâ©„ÅØ„Åü„Åè„Åï„Çì„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„Åô„Åå„ÄÅÂÆâ„Åè„Å¶„ÇÇÁæéÂë≥„Åó„ÅÑ„ÇÇ„ÅÆ„ÇÇ„ÅÇ„Çä„Åæ„ÅôÔºÅ„Åù„Çå„Åå„Åì„ÅÆÔºôÔºô„Çª„É≥„Éà„Éî„Ç∂„Åß„ÅôÔºÅ
I love this place and make sure every time I visit New York I go for a slice (or 10). Quality tasting pizza slices at unbeatable prices, an absolute bargain.

column3: Great pizza at a great price!
column4: We got a whole pizza for $10 ($8 for pizza and extra $2 for sausage). It was made fresh and we took it back to our hotel to eat. It was delicious and quick!
It was surprinsingly good. I got 2 slices, they were big. I come from a country that offers cheap food but the 1 dollar pizza is really bad here. So, kudos to NYC
We knew it was good when we saw the locals coming in. This place is small but the flavor is big! Best pizza we‚Äôve had so far in NY.
Awesome quick bite. They only serve pizza and only take cash. The staff was great and so was the slice

Some of the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had. Very authentic New York pizza eaten standing up and all. Not as greasy as you‚Äôd expect and super fresh and hot. Some of the best crust I have ever eaten. 10/10 recommend.
Passed this place everyday. 99 cents well Actually 1$ as no 1 cent change ever and I always grabbed a slice of pizza when passing daily 7/10 so filled a space in the stomach.

Located near Westin New York hotel at Times Square, this small pizza store is always busy and amazingly it opens 24 hours. Even though it is cheap, the pizza there is surprisingly good and tasty. One of the hidden gems in New York City.
My boyfriend especially loved this pizza!! He can't wait to get more. Such good value for money and quick service.

column3: One of the hidden gems of NYC
column4: Just like everyone else has mentioned, two slices of cheese and a soda for $2.75 is impossible to beat! Food is delicious, cooked on site and it‚Äôs no wonder it‚Äôs popular! Went to this place several times üçï
Quick bite to eat. Two slides of cheese pizza and a drink for $2.75. Bargain! Pizza is good too. It‚Äôs only 50c for extra toppings too.

Can't beat this one on price and it's tasty. One of the nice things about NYC is pizza. We usually get a slice at several places over our stay to figure out the best. This one was really good, really cheesey. Like it a lot.

$2.75 for 2 slices and a canned soda or bottled water. This pizza is very delicious and easy on your wallet. My boys liked it so much ... we ate there 3 times while in the city. Located a block from Time Square.
Tried a number of places for pizza slices ajd this was by far the best. Freshly cooked, 99cents and i ate it for breakfast. Best life lived!!!
This pizza is very delicious and the most important thing is also delicious for your wallet üòä we order 18‚Äù pie pizza only for $8+tax ü§©
Can't go wrong grabbing a slice here! The pizza is fresh, hot, and delicious, and the guys that work here are nice. The price is great too!
I love NY pizza and for a dollar a slice you can‚Äôt go wrong. I grab the slice and eat it as I trot down the street.

This place is great $1 for a slice would recommend if in area. Had the good old cheese pizza. They have pizza already cooked and ready to eat. Must of been a good place as had a heap of NYPD picking up.
$1 for a large slice that tastes pretty decent. Great if you‚Äôre just after a snack or want a quick dinner. Big thumbs up üëç
You must to try this üçï pizza shop pay little and get more I like this special thy seals only 2 or 3 type of pizza so they focus in area
Instant pizza of good quality at an affordable price. Favourite place on the go. Rekommended for all
Very tasty recipe and good portion two piece is more than enough cheese pizza is I recommend... small shop in active area. Better for take away
Came across this when walking back to hotel had 3 slices for two of us could maybe had another slice or two. Good pizza enjoyed it would definitely visit again. 2 slices and can juice all for $2.75
This pizza is very good and the price is amazing. It is always fresh and they always have a line. I always come here when I‚Äôm in NY.
$1 a slice (includes tax). Great pizza. Great value. This is a popular place for people to go on lunch during work, or after getting off work. No seating. Hole in the wall.
Great pizza and only 99cent a slice or $8 for an 18‚Äù pizza. Kids loved (16 & 18 year old) it and it‚Äôs open 24hrs so we stopped by on our way back to the Hotel on a couple of occasions.
Good price for a slice of pizza. The cheese pizza is super good. And it‚Äôs enough with two pieces so best prize for a meal in nyc.
NYC is famous for pizza and New Yorkers eat a lot of Grab and Go food. The $1.00 slice is a favorite and 99 Cent Fresh Pizza is a popular spot to grab a slice. Really surprised at how good it tasted.
Pizza was good and only cost 99 cents. Can‚Äôt beat it. It was hot and tasted fresh. Would definitely stop here again for a quick slice.
It is more than what you expect for a $1 pizza, much better when it‚Äôs fresh. Ideal if you are on a budget!

column3: A must visit after a days sightseeing
column4: You can find quite a few of these $0.99 pizza slice around the Lexington Ave area and is more than enough for a filling snack without breaking the bank! And so tasty, cash only though.
Food can cost a fortune in NYC. You owe it to yourself and wallet to try this once. The pizza was great. We planned a day to eat only at food trucks and this pizza place and it was great!
You can't go wrong! Fresh, hot pizza makes a quick meal or snack. I like it best with hot sauce and two napkins!
I had heard all about this place and decided to give it a try.. While it is not your regular everyday pizza, it is not bad at all...
.99 a large slice of pizza? Amazing!! Tasted great. Tell me where you can get 2 slices and a can for 2.75 in ,NYC? Only here! Yumm

We were looking for a quick bite to eat and inexpensive. This was an excellent find! We got two slices of pizza and a can of soda for $2.75. It tasted excellent and was quintessentially New York style pizza.
This was our first stop in NYC after dumping our bags in the hotel & we were really impressed! The best fast food I've ever had... fresh, tasty & only 99c :)
Great pizza for 99c we had this most nights tasty and quick service for all r shopping will definitely be back
Grabbed a couple of slices on the way back to the hotel after a long day of sightseeing- had very low expectations, but i was wrong, thus was quite delicious!

Walked up and got a big slice of great NY plain cheese pizza for $1...couldn't be better! Tastes Great, Super Fast, Cheap! I saw a fast moving line of locals going in and out .... can't go wrong here! Close to Grand Central Station.
Standing room only, longer lines but they move quickly, good pizza for the price! Fast and efficient and for the price it can't be beat!
We found that place accidentally and we would visit it every day during our trip to NYC. The pizza was great and cheap.

Quick service, great pizza. It is a cash only establishment which makes sense for 99c but when you are used to using a card for everything, you might panic wondering if you have enough cash (like we did!).
You know the food is good when there is a queue outside the door. Can't go wrong with a large slice of pizza, plus you can add your own toppings too!
Had dinner there 2 or 3 times because it is very cheap and the pizza is great. Big slices and very fast.

column3: 7 Nights in NYC ‚Äì Hotter than July, Pack your Trainers - PIZZA
column4: We had three slices of pizza and sprinkled on powdered garlic and black pepper. Perfect, cheap, fresh and delicious. Courteous staff.

Great for a quick bite. Super inexpensive and pizza is good. Great way to keep the cost down on trips. If you have a family and need a cheap meal check them out. You can get a whole pizza for eight dollars!
Stays open late, 99 cents, hot and cheesy goodness! Definitely hole in the wall, but a perfect snack or dinner on the go or place to hit up post bar food.
A must visit when in New York, for 99cent you get a average slice of pizza but at this price you can't complain
If you're looking for a cheap slice, this is a solid place to go. Cheap pizza is a staple of the NY experience
Cheap eats yet good pizza. You would not expect a good slice at this price but think again. The cheese pizza was good and the 2 slices and a soda deal was the best food/meal value in NYC.

column3: No thrills, steer side standup and ear piazza
column4: Great, cheep and always busy - fresh pizza all day and night. Consistently spot on. You'll love this place - it has personality.

column3: Does what it says on the tin
column4: It's not flashy, it's not the best pizza you'll ever eat but it's good, cheap and convenient. Fill yourself up for less that a fiver, can't really go wrong.
$1.00 or the door for some great pizza. Make sure you get a cold piece reheated, it makes the crust better.
I got a slice right after checking into the hotel and then took my husband back another evening. He doesn't like pizza but he liked this. I could eat it every day.
I tried pizza 4 times during my visit to New York City and this is still my favorite place! I challenge you to buy extra and share. You will make someone else's day!

Yes this really is pizza for a cent cheaper than the dollar pizza guys! Better service, smiles and the pizza is good with change from a dollar, if you are hungry and only have a dollar then eat here, it's good
You are in NYC unless there is not a scrap to eat wnywhere do not choose this its not pizza. Its not even real cheese or sauce.
Found this little gem one night and went back there every day of our trip. Always fresh and hot. Staff friendly and great location to grand central station. Great pizza and only .99c for a big slice.
Good old fashion greasy large slice pizza - eat on the move! could not believe it really was $.99 and the size and taste wow!!
Good pizza, great service, great price! Perfect late night snack. By the slice, carry out only, close to hotels on Lexington.
It is what it is, a quick cheap snack. It is the most average pizza in the city but when you need something just to get into your stomach and you only have a dollar, it serves it's purpose.
This is great fresh 99 cent pizza. We stopped every morning for breakfast and grabbed a slice. The slices are big, with crispy crust, light sauce and a good amount of cheese.

Wow. Couldn't believe the fantastic quality, very generous size slice of pizza. It tasted absolutely amazing, so good that my husband went straight back in for a second slice. And at under a dollar.. Come on? What's not to love

I found this place by chance and went back a few time over the week I was in NYC. Fresh pizza cooked there and then and so cheap! Lots of locals using this so that is a pretty good sign. Would recommend this to others.
Great value and lives up to the hype. Decent New form style pizza. I would highly recommend it. Definitely bang for the buck.

column3: Does exactly what it says on the tin.... Well.
column4: Classic cheese and tomato slice for 99c... Great pizza and a bargain to boot. Can not fault it. Open 24 hours.
I freaking love this place. Simple cheese classic NY pizza for 99c a slice. And $2.75 for two slices and a can of pop? Come on. So good.

column3: Does what it says on the tin!!
column4: Stopped for a really quick bite. And it was very quick, very fresh and very cheap. 100% recommend if around the Grand Central area. If they are busy you are only likely to get marguerita, but it's got great flavour.

column3: Average pizza but oh so cheap
column4: The 99 cent cheese slice is quite large and it is just a fun New York experience. Where else are there tiny pizza places selling decent cheap pizza? There are quite a few locations throughout the city. I would recommend!

column3: It's part of the NYC experience
column4: This was a must while in NYC to eat from these vendors. Part of our cliche list. Worth it. Must do. Especially after all the walking we did a pizza hit the spot.
We have pizza from this place every single night during our stay in NY! love it! Fresh, hot right out of the oven! A+

column3: Grab a pizza whenever you want..
column4: This place serve mainly cheese pizza, but i thing you can add something extra.. They also sell soda! The pizza taste good and only cost 99 cent so its value for money. Other than that its not to much to say..
We ordered the special of two slices and a bottle of water for 2.75. The pizza was pretty standard NY pizza. It was hot and tasted good and was very fast fix for an empty stomach!

Thin, crunchy and inexpensive pizza. Not too much cheese but the right amount of taste! I think you can request extra cheese for an extra charge but the $.99 slice is perfect. The kids wolfed them down in no time.
It's 99 cent/slice pizza. Nothing more, nothing less, but you walk away happy. Tastes great even though they skimp on cheese, and two is plenty to fill you up. Just load on the free parmesan!

We went here because some nice guy recommended it on the street. We didn't know what to think at first, but when we got four slices and tried it they were amazing!!! I totally recommend this place for a quick stop.
I had low expectations but my kid insisted, it's a whole in the wall. But really is 99 cents for large slice! The only cheap, good food we found in NYC.
Who said NYC was expensive! Three massive slices for under three dollars and they came quick, hot and damn tasty.

Loved the price and the convenience. This is a seriously good on the go slice to eat! Super close to GCTerminal and a nice way to eat affordably for an evening. Frequented by locals too, a good sign:)
Quick slice of pizza Fresh Great price Great when on the go :) Can buy a slice or tow and drinks if required
If you need a quick snack or have a teen that seems to never be full this is for you. A buck a slice or 2 with a soda for just under $3.
Got to love what Abdul is doing in his little shop. only sells one flavour and it is worth it. getting it fresh out of the oven is always a win.

column3: great pizza for a good price
column4: this place was close to our hotel, so we stepped by almost everyday for one or two pieces of pizza. we were quite surprised how good it is and really recommend you give it a try
Delicious, hot pizza for 99cents! You can also get 2 slices and a can of pop for less than $3. Liked it so much we got a whole pie for dinner one night.
Great pizza, fast and made to order. Cheap and delicious! We ate here two nights because we had had law lunches and weren't super hungry. Big slices
Very good pizza at a Steal of a Deal! I was a little hesitant but very pleased at how good the pizza was for the price. 2 slices and a drink for $2.75...you can't go wrong!
And it was late, and I wanted pizza. Still, I left disappointed. It's New York after all. Hold out 'till morning and find something better.
A great option if you are hungry and looking for a quick bite!
A must have after a great night out with friends. It's nothing fancy but the sauce is delicious and the toppings are fresh. You can't beat a good hot slice of pizza!
Pizza is fresh, price is good, line is long... but you can't beat 2 slices and a soda for $2.25. Yum!
Good taste, made fresh, .50 to add extra toppings great combos! Loved it!
This is a great Deal.... Pizza was Yummy.... Great for easy dinner
The best cheap pizza in NYC.. can't beat 99c/slice, or ~$8 for a whole cheese pie!
